events.name: What’s new in iOS 9, Xcode 7 and Swift 2?
events.description: Mugunth Kumar (editor's note: the Great Mugunth Kumar of iOS Pushing The Limits fame) will be sharing with us the latest features for developers in iOS 9, Swift 2 and Xcode 7. Specifically, for iOS 9, he will discuss about * Split screen Multitasking * Search and Deep linking * App Thinning * Cloud Kit * News Publisher * Content Blocker Extensions For Swift 2, he will talk about the specifics of * Error handling with do-try-catch * Availability annotation And in Xcode 7 * App Thinning with Assets Library * Bitcode Mugunth is an independent iOS developer based in Singapore. He graduated in 2009 and holds a Masters degree from Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, majoring in Information Systems. He blogs about mobile development, writing tutorials focussing mostly on iOS platform Mugunth also runs a classroom-based training teaching the advanced concepts in iOS programming in Singapore (iostraining.sg). Prior to iOS development he worked for top Fortune 500 companies consulting on Windows and .NET platforms. His core areas of interest include programming methodologies, Mobile Development and Usability Engineering. If he were not coding, he would probably be found at some exotic place capturing scenic photos of Mother Nature.

events.name: Mid-Year catch up
events.description: Dear friends, It's been a while since we last got together, and how better than to celebrate the mid-year over drinks to meet and greet your fellow DataKinders! Come say hi, and bond over food and drinks! It's pay your own way. We'll post a venue soon once we found a comfy bar where we can have a cozy chat. See you there!
events.location: FIV五 @ Great Eastern Centre, 1 Pickering Street 048659, Singapore
